deleteAllPersona.title: Are you sure you want to delete?
deleteAllPersona.label: Delete All Personas
deleteAllPersona.text: Deleting cannot be undone. Also, preset personas will not be deleted. Are you sure?

expertMode.label: Expert Mode
expertMode.notes: Expert mode lets you choose the language model and edit prompts.

personaExtractionPrompt.label: Persona Extraction Prompt
personaExtractionPrompt.notes: Edit the prompt for extracting personas from files.

globalConversationPrompt.label: Global Conversation Prompt
globalConversationPrompt.notes: Tune response style and tone in chat.

profileImageGenerationPrompt.label: Profile Image Generation Prompt
profileImageGenerationPrompt.notes: Adjust the the impression and direction of the profile image.

openAIQQQFLASH.label: Open AIQQQ FLASH
openAIQQQFLASH.notes: AIQQQ FLASH is an AI brainstorming system that delivers ideas in an instant.

logout.title: Are you sure you want to logout?
logout.text: You will now log out of all internal services that require Okta authentication (ESQ-related, Microsoft software, etc.). Are you sure?

expertModeOnModal.label: Expert Mode
expertModeOnModal.notes:
For a password, contact the admin office: watabe.kazuhiro@dentsudigital.co.jp

Please enter your email address as follows.
【AIQQQ TALK パスワード照会】

expertModeOffModal.label: Turn Off Expert Mode
expertModeOffModal.text: Edited prompts will revert to the default. Are you sure?
